name: E-commerce Website
description: Developed a fully responsive, feature-rich e-commerce website for a local business using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. The project included the integration of user authentication, a dynamic product catalog, shopping cart functionality, and secure payment gateway integration (Stripe API). Focused on delivering an intuitive, seamless user experience, optimizing page load speeds, and ensuring mobile-first design principles.

name: Portfolio
description: Built a personal portfolio website to showcase academic projects, coding skills, and creative work. The website includes a clean, modern design with sections for my biography, projects, skills, and contact information. The project utilized HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, and was designed with a mobile-first approach to ensure responsiveness across all devices. This project helped me develop a strong understanding of front-end web development principles.
